long_description: Use the Hugger Mugger Yoga exercise ball to help improve core strength, balance and stability. It's great for yoga, Pilates, dance and daily workout routines. Ball helps to improve balance, strength and stability. Made from durable vinyl, the ball can support up to 600 lbs. Ball is shipped uninflated and includes a small handheld pump. 75cm (29.5 in.) ball is recommended for people 6 ft. tall and taller.
short_description: Use the Hugger Mugger Yoga exercise ball to help improve core strength, balance and stability. It's great for yoga, Pilates, dance and daily workout routines.
